After merging this data with the merchant codes above, 1,247,438 transactions are dropped. Of these dropped observation, around 1.1 million records are related to 1) cash advances, interests, late fees, account adjustments, balance transfers, card payments and similar activities not generated by actual purchases, 2) direct marketers and telemarketers, 3) unknown merchants. We further keep only records that are actual purchases (Ã¢â¬Åtransaction typeÃ¢â¬Âcode equal to 253) originating on or after February 1, 2003. This leaves us with 2,207,907 transactions from 80,087 accounts.
